oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Bridge Co. advertisement
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Transforming the Economy
Infrastructure
Bridge construction industry; Nashville Bridge Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This advertisement appeared in the Official souvenir program and guide, Tennessee State Fair, September 23rd to 28th, 1907 (Nashville, Tenn. : Folk-Keelin Print. Co., 1907?).
Founded by Arthur J. Dyer, the Nashville Bridge Company was Tennessee's most productive bridge building firm in the early twentieth century.
